Quickly generate secure password for the websites which disable the browser function to generate a secure one, This tool is developed for VMaC Consulting team when using secure financial websites,

You are defiantly welcome to use it

Instructions:
1. Simply right click and generate a password,
2. The password will be copy into the clipboard to paste it in the confirmation password input field

That is all,
